      • changeMotion

        public void changeMotion(double angle,
                         double velocity)
        Change this object's motion vector by rotating it angle*PI degrees and adding velocity to it's length
        Parameters:
        angle - The value to sum to the angle of this object's motion vector
        velocity - The value to sum to the length of this object's motion vector

      • setMotion

        public void setMotion(double angle,
                      double velocity)
        Change this object's motion vector by rotating it's orientation to angle*PI degrees and it's length to velocity
        Parameters:
        angle - The new value of the angle of this object's motion vector
        velocity - The new value of the length of this object's motion vector
